#  The 10 Best Bluetooth Speakers for Your Money

Kate Halse

If you're looking for impressive sound in a compact speaker that you can take
with you on your travels, it's time to replace that clunky speaker you've had
for years with a Bluetooth speaker.

Whether you're looking for the best outdoor Bluetooth speaker, a stylish
speaker, or a waterproof Bluetooth speaker, you'll find plenty of options.
Some speakers have a longer battery life while others stand out for their
impressive sound quality and other notable features.

1

## Best Overall: Bose SoundLink Revolve+

The Bose SoundLink Revolve isn't cheap, but its rich and full 360-degree sound
puts the speaker above its competitors. Users also appreciate its versatility,
noting that it can be hung on the ceiling or placed just about anywhere in the
room. Wireless Bluetooth pairing is simple and effective. However, the
wireless range isn't the most impressive. There are some complaints about
diminished sound quality at maximum volume.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-images/media/i7x8-l5bv4j-ngl-
gwmmdk9z0bqs0pbhwp-v3iyzw-x-
wyswanpnk-5yozplcwoxfpbhkzqxr-3lj8rbzer8vt7xxlrodzeeubzd-3ehdh39yvk-
acgdpg6qjafqu4zucpa0jkmynrnl5omjq.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B06XCW4VFS?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

2

## Best Value: Echo Dot (3rd Gen)

The [Echo Dot (3rd Gen)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07W95GZNH?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers) is a compact smart speaker with
impressive sound quality for its size, although some owners wish the sound
quality was better. Built-in Alexa lets you ask for the latest news headlines,
weather reports, and make calls. A few users say that voice recognition
technology could use some work. Setup is simple, but some 5GHz network
connection issues have been reported.

  

  

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-
images/media/bua1ghdzly7pw9k80e2vk-
sq7lzaft6pmrjpo8-ks-x0yms3-ia3vrwv5uizdhsr2yjkps7as-qllw-
wepbgv44ubpkw9dvwbodmou2qy-lvh-
ilrrctzncamt5flsieaz8kchuyrpzswdespw.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07W95GZNH?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

3

## Best For Parties: Anker Soundcore Flare Mini

Immersive sound and an LED light show makes the [Anker Soundcore Flare
Mini](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07PPNY861?tag=cs-fppl-desktop-20&subtag=best-
bluetooth-speakers) a hit at any party. You can easily disable the lights if
you prefer, although you can't change the pre-programmed light patterns.

Party-goers will appreciate this speaker's reputation for delivering up to
several hours of sound at maximum volume without draining the battery.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-images/media/ua6zbeqxm-
obbly471aybgx-gdcskalwfmhkd-
ljr0ds9buspr35hvuaavnigoawrscqflzqjkcypddejimzrslbkj5-y2koptucrnrgs-f8yc-8fqduwwwicu1fpjjrjnndqas37-klksksw.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07PPNY861?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

4

## Best Wireless Range: Oontz Angle 3XL Ultra

With a wireless range up to 100 feet, the [Oontz Angle 3XL
Ultra](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07DK3RTX9?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers) gives you more freedom to play your
favorite songs. Music lovers appreciate the highs, mids, and bass on this
speaker, which results in well-rounded sound in most settings.

Despite its rich sound, the speaker isn't the loudest. Many owners find the
sound to be best when using two of these speakers.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-
images/media/3anep1eki-9poqvwz93blbgq7jn2xo8aglcksxtevtihblz6rpgvnlhxt21o5kachrxq5s5nqpobduwwac-o1q8iixqmoaey6epudnx6lou4r45bnaezreczqt-
e-rje2cfk5v4bupvho-taew.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07DK3RTX9?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

5

## Best Waterproof Speaker: JBL FLIP 5

An IPX7 waterproof rating means you can lounge with the [JBL FLIP
5](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07QK2SPP7?tag=cs-fppl-desktop-20&subtag=best-
bluetooth-speakers) by the pool, take it to the beach, or even continue to
listen to music during a rain shower. Several owners comment on the crisp and
clear sound quality, even on maximum volume.

The speaker seems to get its 12 hours of playtime as advertised, although it
doesn't run quite as long on the highest setting.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-images/media/5o4xh-
prc0nofmwkyyilf-8fvtp0tetehjdeo9iub7grsi0lmidlfue20wqql6jw4gr5uo6vllfitnu53o-jd8evyxvnnivogmc1shyqnrfqucvnxlylzb4bjzy-r87ixkut0wfjcon2znyya.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07QK2SPP7?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

6

## Most Stylish Bluetooth Speaker: XLEADER SoundAngel A8 (2nd Gen)

The [XLEADER SoundAngel A8 (2nd
Gen)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0773J4PDV?tag=cs-fppl-desktop-20&subtag=best-
bluetooth-speakers) is equally stylish and functional, so you can proudly
display the speaker inside or outdoors. Despite its compact size, this
portable Bluetooth speaker has a rich, high-def sound complete with a
subwoofer resonator.

The fact that the speaker is located on the bottom of the unit leads some
owners to complain about a somewhat muffled sound.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-
images/media/zpv5b4iykpre5y-15bxh-4kke8frbl6vjh08kthhzcxjqstcosqm93gh5lul0blxkp0ruhl6rquh6zjgopuo2skkoyipxebimhjuk6alnviwnhhtepe-
yqfzwwkhka-xaaovxwi-
zbqtziylog.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0773J4PDV?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

7

## Best Battery Life: DOSS SoundBox Plus

With a playtime of 20 hours, you can easily party the night away with this
speaker. The [DOSS SoundBox Plus](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07T2B23Y2?tag=cs-
fppl-desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers) has soft mixed lights to
invigorate the surrounding atmosphere. Users especially like being able to
choose from a variety of light effects.

The fact that the volume is adjustable by tracing the middle circle in the
direction you wish the sound to go results in mixed reviews.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-
images/media/pz9btnekbiegeqsevblobsw4sufkhuspkbq0fbjpl44m-gfvgncyykqfof-
kf6jtxpbjknj-z5s6svucsiqmihd-txsfcobdkarbpl-5tmjgcdnf722vo-
auqi8ud7r4e9txnxwvzr0bz8ldq.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07T2B23Y2?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

8

## Loudest Bluetooth Speaker: SOUNDBOKS 2

A robust 122 decibels of volume, complete with full bass and treble, cements
the [SOUNDBOKS 2](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B077XFYQ6F?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers) Bluetooth speaker's status as the
loudest wireless Bluetooth speaker. An included swappable battery pack
delivers an average listening time of 40 hours.

If you can carry the hefty 33-pound speaker, its dirt- and water-resistant
exterior makes it a fun choice for outdoor parties.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-images/media/suutdm-ag-
ns4dw9hqhupgcj72abxlb7towjpnipmaccwcnbkup7yffntpz0yvfcb0hjyda9zxshtcckod3bqnrasbhv-
kvpaddwge8vd6szikapn5t5sji6g-xv-
cmexdxhnxak2lbg-65dnq.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B077XFYQ6F?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

9

## Best For Outdoor Listening: ULTIMATE EARS WONDERBOOM 2

If you're straining to properly hear your favorite songs outdoors, simply
press the outdoor boost button for an instant boost in volume and clarity.

While the [ULTIMATE EARS WONDERBOOM
2](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07NFRCK7J?tag=cs-fppl-desktop-20&subtag=best-
bluetooth-speakers) has an estimated battery life of 13 hours, it doesn't last
that long on full volume. However, you can continue to listen to your favorite
music as the speaker recharges.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-
images/media/0rujquwzud8sctmucf5kg-b589y5latvwqofn4d2ivr5bnm-gqnlnia-2s5xfh-
skotp3nnsqwhp7f46ldw-
whdtbdqdb53gfk4ltc0u-ksqigbffeazminx3n-3nteoum02rsnvot64w5ch2q.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07NFRCK7J?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)

10

## Best Compact Bluetooth Speaker: Bose SoundLink Micro

Despite its compact size, the [SoundLink Micro
Bluetooth](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0748PGNBX?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers) offers crisp and balanced sound and
runs up to six hours per charge. Some owners say the bass isn't very robust,
especially at higher volumes. The small speaker also has a waterproof IPX7
rating, so you don't have to worry about showers and splashes. Siri and Google
compatibility lets you use voice commands.

![](https://images.consumersearch.com/amg-cms-cs-
images/media/botqa3uikbmxlhtmv5a5ffdv2xmq-
si78hsephc7pddvf8bdeefw2oyz24rpb7k5hflzucealwxwpbxzcjhvz-m63avdi6f0mx3iroaf-
cewiosfudee6wrpofstcq8cekacjwp3jbczonm8yw.jpeg?width=260&height=260&fit=bounds&format=pjpg)

[buy now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0748PGNBX?tag=cs-fppl-
desktop-20&subtag=best-bluetooth-speakers)
